sourceMeaningMnemonic: The kanji and the radical that look like this are exactly the same. They are both <kanji>cottage</kanji>.
meaningInfo: As long as you know the radical cottage, you know the kanji cottage.
readingMnemonic: You got this <kanji>cottage</kanji> from a <reading>sha</reading>man (<ja>しゃ</ja>). In fact, everyone you know got their cottage from a shaman. One day you're just walking in the woods, and the next thing you know, a shaman is giving you the keys to their old cottage.
readingInfo: I guess shamans are moving out a lot around here. Why don't you go look for a cottage you can buy from a shaman! I bet you'll get a pretty good, totally not cursed, deal!
